name: Programming Job Checklist

items.detailText: Social networking and social learning improve learning outcomes, motivation, and job search outcomes.

Read ###LINK### and updated my settings as needed.

I feel fairly confident that I have learned basic CSS

I have optimized my LinkedIn. This includes a professional photo. Consider using ###LINK### or a similar tool. Remember to identify yourself confidently as a software engineer, developer, or similar. Do not title yourself as junior, aspiring, or similar.
I am continually applying to 70+ places each week with social follow-up as prescribed in ###LINK###

items.detailText: This is a key material for whiteboard-style interviews. It will substantially increase your job search performance.
items.displayText: I have been following the ###LINK### article for at least two weeks

items.detailText: This is a key material for whiteboard-style interviews. It will substantially increase your job search performance.
items.displayText: I have read the ###LINK### article.

items: Every two weeks, I am getting one or more phone screen or initial interview requests from employers. If I don't, I will reach out to a mentor to help investigate the lack of phone screening progress.
I have had at least one interview. After every interview, I have sought feedback, reflected, and incorporated at least one change to improve my job search going forward
I commit to reach out for help whenever needed in the Ladderly community, endorsed communities, or through independent outreach using social media and my personal social network

items.displayText: I have landed a full time role involving coding!

name: Python Checklist
items: Build a Data Viz project with Seaborn
